title: Did Reality TV Star Bethenny Frankel Say This About Meghan Markle?
subtitle: The "Real Housewives of New York" star tweeted hours before Oprah Winfrey's interview with Harry and Meghan would air.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: On the morning of March 7, 2021 — hours before CBS aired an interview featuring Oprah, Prince Harry, and Meghan Markle — reality TV star Bethenny Frankel used Twitter to mock sympathetic sentiments toward the Duchess of Sussex.
